textBeforeTable: Cr Cash a/c Dr The following is the General Ledger of Mr. Ibrahim, containing all the Ledger accounts within the accounting system. General Ledger [Books of Mr. Ibrahim]     Illustration » General Ledger What the credit amount actually means is dependent on the method used for constructing the trial balance. This is the amount whose information is extracted from the ledger account. • Credit amount What the debit amount actually means is dependent on the method used for constructing the trial balance. This is the amount whose information is extracted from the ledger account. • Debit amount Ledger Folio gives the information relating to the page number in the ledger from which the information relating to the ledger is being extracted. • L/F » Ledger Folio Each row in the trial balance pertains to the information relating to an account. The name of the Account head is written in the particulars column. • Particulars The heading row contains the heading for the trial balance. It consists of the details relating to name of the organisation
